author: weaver
msg: Fixed an issue with certain SDK versions failing to do to attempts to use java.util.prefs.FileSystemPrefs
(on Linux were the user has now write access to the SDK install dir).  Just use our prefs impl instead.

author: weaver
msg: Removed hard-coding of the title from the layouts and replaced with logic to use the actual psml page title.

author: weaver
msg: All decorations now use the new getTitle(PortletEntity, Fragment) method.

author: weaver
msg: added an addtional getTitle() method which will override the portlet title with the fragment title.

author: weaver
msg: Added logic to emulate the old deploy/undeploy logic of previous maven versions.  This helps keep maven from getting "confused".
